00019 #include "CDFCntrlFileWriter.h"
00020 
00021 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00022 
00023 CDFCntrlFileWriter::CDFCntrlFileWriter(CDFData &p) 
00024 {
00025         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00026         contentsPos = 0;
00027         WriteHeaders();
00028         dataGroupWriter = 0;
00029 
00030         //skip ahead to the position of the first probe set dataSet
00031         int32_t probes = p.GetProbeSetCnt();
00032         int32_t size = probes * ((MAX_CDF_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH * 2) + 8); 
00033         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(size);
00034         
00035         // Set the file position of the next DataGroup
00036         writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0).UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00037 }
00038 
00039 CDFCntrlFileWriter::~CDFCntrlFileWriter() 
00040 {
00041         delete writer;
00042         if(dataGroupWriter != 0) delete dataGroupWriter;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void CDFCntrlFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00046 {
00047         writer->WriteHeader();
00048         DataGroupWriter* dataGroupWriter = &writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00049         dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00050         contentsWriter = &dataGroupWriter->GetDataSetWriter(0);
00051         contentsWriter->WriteHeader();
00052         contentsPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00053 }
00054 
00055 CDFCntrlProbeSetWriter* CDFCntrlFileWriter::GetCntrlProbeSetWriter(const std::wstring& probeSetType)
00056 {
00057         dataSetHdr.Clear();
00058         dataSetHdr.SetName(probeSetType);
00059 
00060         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00061         t1.SetName(QC_PROBESET_TYPE);
00062         t1.SetValueText(probeSetType);
00063         dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(t1);
00064 
00065         dataSetHdr.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00066         dataSetHdr.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00067         dataSetHdr.AddUByteColumn(L"");
00068         dataSetHdr.AddUByteColumn(L"");
00069         dataSetHdr.AddUByteColumn(L"");
00070 
00071         return new CDFCntrlProbeSetWriter(dataGroupWriter->CreateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr));
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CDFCntrlFileWriter::OpenDataGroup(const std::wstring& probeSetType, int dataSetCnt)
00075 {
00076         DataGroupHeader dataGroup(probeSetType);
00077         for(int i = 0; i < dataSetCnt; i++)
00078         {
00079                 DataSetHeader dsh;
00080                 dataGroup.AddDataSetHdr(dsh);
00081         }
00082         dataGroupWriter = writer->CreateDataGroupWriter(dataGroup);
00083 
00084         WriteContentsEntry(probeSetType);
00085 
00086         dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void CDFCntrlFileWriter::CloseDataGroup()
00090 {
00091         dataGroupWriter->Close();
00092         delete dataGroupWriter;
00093         dataGroupWriter = 0;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void CDFCntrlFileWriter::WriteContentsEntry(const std::wstring& probeSetType)
00097 {
00098         u_int32_t currentPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00099         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(contentsPos);
00100         contentsWriter->Write(probeSetType, 32);
00101         contentsWriter->Write(currentPos);
00102         contentsPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00103         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(currentPos);
00104 }
